text: declaration of purpose mr wentworth cheswill was born on april in newmarket new hampshire mr cheswill a man of color has been said to have been the first elected official in the united states he was a revolutionary war veteran and served under john langdon in langdon s company of light horse volunteers he was an elected newmarket town official and served the town in various elected town offices from until his death in in mr cheswill was among the founders of the first free library in the town and provided in his will for public access to his personal library commemorative historical plaque for wentworth cheswill the joint legislative historical committee is authorized to accept a gift of a commemorative historical plaque for wentworth cheswill and oversee the placement of the plaque in the state house lba amended hb fiscal note as amended by the house amendment h methodology the office of legislative budget assistant states this bill as amended by the house has no fiscal impact on state county and local expenditures or revenue agencies contacted none
